name: The Art of Budgeting
title: Kaveh: The Art of Budgeting
in_play_description: When Kaveh, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and after you trigger Burst Scan's effects: Add 1 copy of the Discarded card into your Hand. If this card is a Location Card, then the next Location Card you play this Round will cost 2 fewer Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Kaveh to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Kaveh, equip this card.
After Kaveh equips this card, immediately use Artistic Ingenuity once.
When Kaveh, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and after you trigger Burst Scan's effects: Add 1 copy of the Discarded card into your Hand. If this card is a Location Card, then the next Location Card you play this Round will cost 2 fewer Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)
(You must have Kaveh in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
